meanings.definition: A building divided into four separate living units.
meanings.sent1: The fourplexes on our street have colorful doors.
meanings.sent2: Many families live in the fourplexes down the road.
meanings.sent3: The fourplexes looked like colorful blocks stacked together.
meanings.sent4: The fourplexes stood like giant puzzle pieces waiting to be solved.
meanings.sent5: I always get lost in the maze of fourplexes in this neighborhood.

meanings.definition: The plural form of fourplex, meaning multiple buildings each divided into four separate living units.
meanings.sent1: There are several fourplexes in this area, each with unique designs.
meanings.sent2: Investors often choose to buy multiple fourplexes for rental income.
meanings.sent3: The fourplexes seemed to multiply overnight, like rabbits in a magic show.
meanings.sent4: The rows of fourplexes stretched out like a never-ending chain of building blocks.
meanings.sent5: The city skyline was dotted with colorful fourplexes, creating a vibrant landscape.
